title: Customer Reports Phishing Email
description: A customer reports receiving a suspicious email that claims to be from the bank.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer not to click any links and to forward the email to the bank's abuse department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, safe instructions to the customer.

tasks.description: Ask the customer if they entered any personal information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Customer confirms they did not enter any information. Agent documents this.

tasks.description: Recommend the customer monitor their account for any unusual activity as a precaution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a sensible security recommendation.
